topic.title: Virus/Riot
topic.body: I'm really lost with the amount of hate right now. Lets get to the point people are fucking dying at a numerous rate and........

1591900871_19Nh4E7nU8DstH29eriZNvAxg6nHu.body:
> [brianhanson2nd](#comment_60_1N8yx3zC1YKuam31pUi9eQUruBCEF9u3eE): Maybe you need to stop watching TV and get out and talk to your neighbors. Turns out that the real world is actually mostly a pretty great place.

haha why would i do that my man, everything is all caddy wampus

> [eltheal](#comment_13_146FHU77ti4zcQNWbtin8fWNRCLd8XYZkf): the world is doing alright

what world do you live in??

> [thorburn](#comment_85_1Q2noE3qu7ccvEspqWWv4xkMktiqp6mhdK): If you're expecting any evidence to support the random claim then it's probably about as complete as it's going to get. As for the dot I guess you're supposed to fill in the blank yourself. [...]

well what do you think about the 99% don't seem like he was even close
